lyrics.stanza: We must ever preach the gospel, Holding forth the word of life. We must never shirk our duty; Saving man from sin and strife.
Fellowship unto the gospel For the increase and the spread; In the vital groups empowered, Into victory we'll be led.
We must ever preach the gospel, Thus our friends and neighbors gain; House to house with vital partners, That our new ones will remain.
We must ever preach the gospel, Cherishing and nourishing; Loving them as our dear children, As our priestly offering.
We must ever preach the gospel By perfecting in the homes Through the word and prayer and singing, Never laboring alone.
We must ever preach the gospel, Learning how to prophesy For the building of the Body, Thus the Lord to glorify.
